constituent: expert, maestro, noren, one, ceiling, towel
koohiiStory1: A maestro in a large auditorium with high ceilings is conducting his orchestra of expert musicians at a fever-pitch, sweat pouring out of him. When the piece is over he reaches for his towel to wipe his brow.
koohiiStory2: Maestro is such as expert, he can conduct even with a towel hanging from the ceiling in front of him.
words:
牧師(ぼくし): pastor, minister, clergyman
医師(いし): doctor
技師(ぎし): engineer, technician
教師(きょうし): classroom teacher
講師(こうし): lecturer
漁師(りょうし): fisherman
